# Writing documents with Rmd

This is a demo on how to build pages with R Markdown and [Bookdown](https://bookdown.org).

This text comes from index.Rmd which is the first page of the project.

Here is a fierce cat:

![lolcat](img/cat.png)

See more cool pictures at Chapter \@ref(images).

Make sure to check out Chapter \@ref(playing-around-with-rmd)!
